"Add Abilities To Items!":
"ARKS these days are so reckless!
They're not adding Special Abilities to
their equipment. Such neglect can only
come from ignorance.
OK, listen up! You can add Special
Abilities to your weapons and armor!
The right Special Abilities can turn the
tide in battle! You'll thank me when you
see your efficiency soar.
Personally, my favorite Special Ability is..."
"Add special abilities to a weapon or unit."
